abstract: Twitter, which suffered a severe outage last week, was hit by two more cyberattacks Tuesday and crashed again. The outages highlight weaknesses in the infrastructure of the popular micro-blogging service.
snippet: Twitter, which suffered a severe outage last week, was hit by two more cyberattacks Tuesday and crashed again. The outages highlight weaknesses in the infrastructure of the popular micro-blogging service.
lead_paragraph: Update | 6:21 p.m.  Added more details about Twitter’s continuing problems and comments from NTT America and a security expert.

headline.main: Twitter Goes Down Again After More Cyberattacks

byline.original: By Vindu Goel and Riva Richmond
